rows.label: tlk400805_msg0001
rows.name:
You're playing tag, right?
I can't tell you then, it
wouldn't be fair...

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0002
rows.name: What? That kid was a thief?

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0003
rows.name:
I see... So that's the boy
Otto was talking about.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0004
rows.name:
Otto's a woodcutter, and he said he
often sees a boy outside of town.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0005
rows.name:
He tells him to go back to
town because it's dangerous,
but the boy always runs away.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't know any more than that, so
why don't you ask Otto directly?

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0007
rows.name:
Otto is at the Nocclia Timber
Site. Be careful on your way.
